entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or wet flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Wet flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning except 50 over exposed coastal sections. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
